info.+content: キャラディのジョークな毎日
A series of daily jokes, introduced by Charady and her pets. Each episode is made by different set of students from the Department of Character Design at the Kyoto University of Art and Design.
キャラディのジョークな毎日

title.+content: Why Didn't You Say So Sooner?
Your Big Mouth Gets You Into Trouble
The Other End Of The line

news.+content: <cite>Charady no Joke na Mainichi</cite> Anime's Website Online
